member.name: M:Ninjanaut.IO.ExcelReader.ToDataTable(System.Byte[],Ninjanaut.IO.ExcelReaderOptions)
member.summary: Returns datatable object from the excel file with values retrieved as strings.
member.param: Settings you might want to change.

member.name: M:Ninjanaut.IO.ExcelReader.ToDataTable(System.String,Ninjanaut.IO.ExcelReaderOptions)
member.summary: Returns datatable object from the excel file with values retrieved as strings.
member.param: Relative or absolute path to the excel file.
Settings you might want to change.

member.name: P:Ninjanaut.IO.ExcelReaderOptions.SheetIndex
member.summary: The index of the excel sheet that you want to convert to a datatable object. Setting SheetIndex with SheetName will throw an exception. If SheetName is not set, the default value is 0.

member.name: P:Ninjanaut.IO.ExcelReaderOptions.SheetName
member.summary: The name of the excel sheet that you want to convert to a datatable object. Setting SheetName with SheetIndex will throw an exception.

member.name: P:Ninjanaut.IO.ExcelReaderOptions.MaxColumns
member.summary: Default value is null. I recommend setting this value so that you don't accidentally load empty columns.
